member.name: P:KLGates.Core.ServiceProxy.ServiceProxyClient`1.ClassName
member.summary: The name of the implementing class on the server. If typeof(T) is an interface as determined by typeof(T).IsInterface then it is assumed that the classname equals typeof(T).Name.Substring(1) which drops the first character of the name.
